name: Adelle Corp
declaringWar: You stand in the way of my people. Let us solve this like warriors!
attacked: You dare have the courage to challenge nod, but no fear, for I will sweep you out of history.
defeated: You have the guts to call my body a corpse but beware, I know what will happen to our future- our tiberium future.
introduction: If I am cut, Do I not bleed?
tradeRequest: I am not always this generous, but we hope you take this rare opportunity we give you.

name: The New Movement
declaringWar: It is in  my Intentions to spread the word of Nod into your land.
attacked: Pitiful fool! Now we shall destroy you!
defeated: I see for the black hand has been unworthy to serve Kane.
introduction: If you would stay out of our way then you might live to tell your tale.
tradeRequest: I would be grateful if you agreed on the following proposal.
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units <for [non-air] units>

name: The Mock
declaringWar: It is in  my Intentions to spread the word of Nod into your land.
attacked: Pitiful fool! Now we shall destroy you!
defeated: I see for the black hand has been unworthy to serve Kane.
introduction: If you would stay out of our way then you might live to tell your tale.
tradeRequest: I would be grateful if you agreed on the following proposal.
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units <for [non-air] units>

name: Andini
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: We will mobilize every means of resistance to stop this transgression against our people!
defeated: We were too weak to protect ourselves...

name: Ashua
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: If you need your nose bloodied, we'll happily serve.
defeated: I have failed. May you, at least, know compassion towards our people.

name: Irgask
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: If you need your nose bloodied, we'll happily serve.
defeated: We... defeated? No... we had so much work to do!

name: Khemul
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: We will mobilize every means of resistance to stop this transgression against our people!
defeated: What a fine battle! Khemul is willing to serve you!

name: Panema
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: You will see you have just bitten off more than you can chew.
defeated: They will write songs of this.... pray that they shall be in your favor.

name: Tonthon
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: You will see you have just bitten off more than you can chew.
defeated: The dark guerilla will never stop haunting you!

name: Artiza
declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
attacked: You can see how fruitless this will be for you... right?
defeated: Perhaps now we will find peace in death...

name: Landoruel
declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
attacked: We are no strangers to war. You have strayed from the right path, and now we will correct it.
defeated: The day of judgement has come to us. But rest assured, the same will go for you!

name: Manthrill
declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
attacked: Oh, truly you are as cruel as your nicknaame.
defeated: You fiend! History shall remember this!

name: Pid
declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
attacked: You can see how fruitless this will be for you... right?
defeated: The principles for which we have fought will survive longer than any nation you could ever build.

name: Silvermane
declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
attacked: We are no strangers to war. You have strayed from the right path, and now we will correct it.
defeated: How barbaric. Those who live by the sword shall perish by the sword.

name: Windemer
declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
attacked: Oh, truly you are as cruel as your nicknaame.
defeated: And so the flower of Windemer falls to barbaric hands...

name: Canthyria
declaringWar: I have to do this, for the sake of progress if nothing else. You must be opposed!
attacked: A barbarian like you will never enough with just a horse. I am not a horse!
defeated: I don't like you, not from the beginning.

name: Clockwerk
declaringWar: I have to do this, for the sake of progress if nothing else. You must be opposed!
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Today, the Clockwerks obey you, but do not think this is over...

name: Dayne
declaringWar: I have to do this, for the sake of progress if nothing else. You must be opposed!
attacked: Just because you can't pay me, you declare war on me?
defeated: Just take all my slave, will you?

name: Dunfirr
declaringWar: I have to do this, for the sake of progress if nothing else. You must be opposed!
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: The great things we'll about to create are gone.

name: Kov
declaringWar: I have to do this, for the sake of progress if nothing else. You must be opposed!
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: So what is the meaning of a miner?

name: Rog
declaringWar: Hungry ... hungry for eternity ...
attacked: What a coincidence, I yearns for a fresh flesh myself!
defeated: Least spare me your leftover meat.

name: Angasin
declaringWar: You have revealed your purposes a bit too early, my friend...
attacked: Traitorous man! I will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
defeated: Perhaps, in another world, we could have been friends...

name: Concordia
declaringWar: You have revealed your purposes a bit too early, my friend...
attacked: Traitorous man! I will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
defeated: A wrong calculation, on my part.

name: Crotoa
declaringWar: You have revealed your purposes a bit too early, my friend...
attacked: Traitorous man! I will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Frostwaste
declaringWar: You have revealed your purposes a bit too early, my friend...
attacked: Traitorous man! I will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
defeated: May the Heavens forgive you for inflicting this humiliation to our people.

name: Gahaldur
declaringWar: You have revealed your purposes a bit too early, my friend...
attacked: Traitorous man! I will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!

name: Shaquad
declaringWar: You have revealed your purposes a bit too early, my friend...
attacked: Traitorous man! I will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
defeated: I guess you weren't here for the sprouts after all...

name: Aerithalas
declaringWar: War lingers in our hearts. Why carry on with a false peace?
attacked: You gormless radger! You'll dine on your own teeth before you set foot in Aerithalas!
defeated: A lonely wind blows through the highlands today. A dirge for Aerithalas. Can you hear it?

name: Corelia
declaringWar: Let's have a nice little War, shall we?
attacked: Damn you, I will not fall.
defeated: This ship may sink, but our spirits will linger.

name: Gildar
declaringWar: We have wanted this for a LONG time. War it shall be.
attacked: So you have chosen death.
defeated: Congratulations, conqueror. This tribe serves you now.

name: Grokzut
declaringWar: Itz time! Itz time to WAAAGH diz pathetic weaklingz!
attacked: HAHAHAHA! Diz iz juzt hilarious! Get em, boiz!
defeated: Gahh... I hate when diz happenz...

name: Tuskarok
declaringWar: I will enjoy hearing your last breath as you witness the destruction of your realm!
attacked: Very well, we will kick you back to the Dark Age!
defeated: What treachery has struck us? No, what evil?

name: Rackedt
declaringWar: We don't like your face. To arms!
attacked: So this is it. You've lost your senses!
defeated: Vile ruler, know that you 'won' this war in name only!

name: Barbarians
uniques: Free [Giant Rat-2] appears <upon gaining a [Giant Rat] unit>
